data.text:
Chris is known for his authenticity and Northern charm. He is grounded, gritty and intelligent, with fantastic comic timing.

From Salford, Manchester.

Well known for playing the Doctor in Doctor Who, as well as for his roles in The A Word and Our Friends in the North for which he received a BAFTA nomination.
